conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway: extruded walls with thickness, visible floor plane, angled/isometric-like camera, and ceiling/roof removed to expose interior.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness and readable interior volume; cutaway is clean and the view is elevated/angled with minimal distortion.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall massing resembles the plan (kitchen left, dining top, living right), but the central bathroom enclosure/partitioning from the 2D plan is not faithfully reproduced (toilet appears in open area rather than inside the small bathroom room). Several interior wall/door placements do not match the plan closely, and window distribution appears simplified/shifted.

interior_elements.notes: Dining table/chairs, sofa, coffee table, kitchen counters present and plausibly placed. Bathroom fixtures are incomplete relative to the 2D plan (missing enclosed bath room/fixtures arrangement).

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render with good contrast and legible wall openings; no text/UI clutter; minor ambiguity around bathroom/door geometry due to simplified partitions.

detected_errors.description: Bathroom room enclosure from 2D plan is not faithfully modeled; toilet is placed without the correct small bathroom partitioning.
Interior partition geometry (central walls/doors) deviates from the 2D plan, affecting adjacency and circulation details.
Windows/door opening locations and counts appear simplified or shifted compared to the 2D plan.

summary: A valid 3D cutaway with strong 3D fundamentals, but only moderately faithful to the 2D plan due to incorrect/missing bathroom enclosure and noticeable interior partition/opening mismatches.
